FAQ

What VPS specs do I need?

4GB RAM for 1 instance, 8GB for 2-3, 16GB for 4-6. Hetzner CX22 ($4/mo) works for a single instance.

How do backups work?

Hourly pg_dump to your S3/R2 bucket. You own your backups. We monitor and alert on failures.

How do upgrades work?

We track Supabase releases, test upgrades first, then push to your instance with automatic rollback if health checks fail.

What if something breaks?

Chat support with AI assistance for common issues. Human escalation for complex problems. We SSH in and fix it.

Do you have access to my data?

We have SSH access to manage Supabase, but your data stays on your VPS. Backups go to your bucket. We don't copy or access your application data.

What's included in Supabase self-hosted?

Postgres, Auth (GoTrue), Realtime, Storage, PostgREST, Kong gateway, and Studio dashboard. Edge Functions available on request (runs on your VPS, not globally distributed).
